quote: It pays to be obvious, especially if you have a reputation for subtlety.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: The time is always right to do what is right
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: I have never let my schooling get in the way of my education.
author: Mark Twain

quote: A coward is incapable of exhibiting love; it is the prerogative of the brave.
author: Mohandas Gandhi

quote: I never met a man so stupid I could not learn something from him.
author: Galileo Galilei

quote: Without friends no one would choose to live, though he had all other goods.
author: Aristotle

quote: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Dignity does not come in possessing honors, but in deserving them.
author: Aristotle

quote: There may be love without jealousy, but there is none without fear.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
author: Albert Camus
